changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding New Concepts for PrEP Screening Tool Form

changeSet.author: Suraj

preConditions.sqlCheck: select COUNT(*) from concept_set cs join concept_name cn on cs.concept_id = cn.concept_id where cs.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name ='PrEP Screening Tool Template' AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") and cs.concept_set IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'All Observation Templates');

changeSet.comment: Adding set member PrEP Screening Tool to all observation templates

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, Is the Client HIV negative"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, Is the client sexually active"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, Is the sexually active in a high prevalence / KP population in the last 6 months?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, If Yes, then Specify1"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, Has the client had vaginal or anal intercourse without condoms with more than 1 partner in the last 6 months?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding "PrEP ST Form, How many sexual partners did you have vaginal or anal sex with?" to numeric table
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO concept_numeric (concept_id,hi_absolute,hi_critical,hi_normal,low_absolute,low_critical,low_normal,units,precise,display_precision) VALUES ((select concept_id from concept_name where name = 'PrEP ST Form, How many sexual partners did you have vaginal or anal sex with?' and concept_name_type = 'FULLY_SPECIFIED' and locale = 'en' and voided = 0),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,1,NULL);

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, In the past 6 months, did you use condoms consistently during sex?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, Does the client have a sex partner with one or more HIV risk factors"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, If Yes, then Specify2"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, In the last 6 months has the client been treated for an STI by lab testing, self-reports, syndromic STI treatment"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, In the last 6 months have you taken post-exposure prophylaxis (PEP) following a potential exposure to HIV?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, In the last 6 months have you used emergency contraception?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, In the last 6 months have you had sex while under the influence of alcohol?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, Are you in a Sero-discordant relationship?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, If Yes, then Specify3"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, Do you have a partners of unknown status who refuse testing?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "PrEP ST Form, Do you inject drugs?"

changeSet.author: Suraj
changeSet.comment: Adding set members to PrEP Screening Tool Form
